attributes.action: vote for Independent Aberdeenshire. From. Scotland,but not United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: By being not controlled by the rest of Scotland. And following their stupid ideas. Rebuild the school systems, the roads and their NHS. And the industrial? Sector and. The oil sector. The farming industry. Some of us are tired of being controlled and being left out.Because of that, it caused Aberdeenshire to go downhill every year. We need investment. And places to go in Aberdeenshire. And the only way to get it. Because there's not enough activities around here. For young people. Like us
attributes.background: Want the government to give us the ability to vote for independence? Then we are not restricted by the rest of Scotland. and be In the United Kingdom at the same time.
